If you facing lag or other problem try this:
Step 1.
Find your game setting file - players\config.cfg, then open it with WordPad.

Step 2.
Press Ctrl + F, then input the "cg_invalidCmdHintBlinkInterval" into the dialog.

Step 3.
Find the "cg_invalidCmdHintBlinkInterval", change the numbers to 2048, then it will show "cg_invalidCmdHintDuration", chage the nuber behind to 0. That's ok!
